h2_title: Where to use The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice in Black Myth: Wukong
content: This material can be used to craft one of the higher-end Weapons in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
This material can be used to craft one of the higher-end Weapons in the game.
